name: simple-hero
description: Clean and minimalist hero section with flexible layouts, perfect for landing pages, portfolios, and content-focused websites. Emphasizes simplicity and readability.
author: PayloadKit
features: 4 layout options: centered, left-aligned, right-aligned, split with image
4 content width settings: narrow, medium, wide, full
Rich content support: eyebrow, title, subtitle, description
Up to 2 call-to-action buttons with 3 styles and 3 sizes
Image support for split layout with left/right positioning
4 background types: color, gradient, image, none
3 text color themes: dark, light, primary
4 title size options: sm, md, lg, xl
Flexible spacing controls for top and bottom padding
Custom HTML ID and class support
usage: Ideal for landing pages, portfolio sites, blog headers, product pages, and any situation where you need a clean, professional hero section without overwhelming visual effects.

preview.description: Clean and minimal hero section with content focus

setup.dependencies: Make sure you have Tailwind CSS configured in your project.
setup.components: This block uses the blocks-shared registry components. Make sure to install them first: payloadkit add blocks-shared
setup.design: This block follows minimalist design principles - perfect for content-focused websites and professional presentations.
